Instructions: For eye-closed resting, please close your eyes and press the spacebar. After approximately 30 seconds, a piano sound will play, signaling you to open your eyes. For eye-open resting, please fixate on the white cross on the screen and press the spacebar. Press the spacebar again to proceed after the resting phase ends.
SubjectArtefactDescription: Participants were instructed to minimize movements and eye blinks. Behavior was monitored during the session.
